column1: # SRS and WL societies found elsewhere, MOs mostly found elsewhere

column2: Is a Shinto patrilineal descendant of Jimmu §G$GAIN$§!
Has participated in a Great Holy War §G$GAIN$§!
Can spend Devotion to become Japanese Monastic Feudal (if not Japanese Imperial or Chinese Imperial)
Can spend Devotion to receive training in a matter touching upon warfare from a Shaolin warrior monk
Can spend Devotion to receive training in a matter touching upon warfare from a Sohei warrior monk
Can spend Devotion to partake in Shinto rituals, improving Shinto opinion
Can spend Devotion to partake in Buddhist rituals, improving Buddhist opinion
Can spend Devotion to partake in Shugendo rituals, improving Shugendo opinion
Can spend Devotion to partake in Koshin rituals, improving Koshin opinion
Can potentially convince [ainu_pagan_reformed.GetName] faithful to become concubines or consorts.
Can intimidate others to leave vassals' factions.
Can intimidate others to join led factions.
Can make use of medical herbs to lessen the impact of wounds or illness.
Can increase the opinion of close relatives.
Power: §YSacred Wisdom§!\nMakes you lose wicked traits and gain pious ones over time.

Combining teachings drawn from Buddhist, Taoist, and Confucian philosophy with devotion to both family and sovereign, the Hwarang are expected to be skilled warriors, paragons of virtue and culture, and loyal subjects, companions, and children.
This character leads the Hwarang and is thus presumed to be wise and benevolent.
Can spend Devotion to ask a temple holder, ascetic, or otherwise suitably learned person for spiritual guidance.
Can choose to leave the society, exchanging all Devotion for Piety and Prestige.
Can spend Devotion to gain the Groomed trait.
Can spend Devotion to inspire loyalty in a vassal or courtier, increasing their opinion of you and possibly having other beneficial effects.
Can spend Devotion to reduce the revolt risk in a province by right-clicking on the target county's coat of arms.
Can spend Devotion to reflect on various ways to improve as a Hwarang.
Can spend Devotion to offer a Non-Aggression Pact to a vassal or a fellow Hwarang. Part of the cost will be refunded if the target refuses.
Can spend Devotion to obtain one of nine different lifestyle traits.
Can spend Devotion to demand the position of Gukseon, provided the current Gukseon is sufficiently old.
Spend Devotion to summon a large force of irregular troops. These troops will remain under your control for as long as you are alive.
Can spend Devotion to make all vassals considerably less likely to join factions for the next two years.

column1: # The Warriors of the Rising Sun

column2: The Warriors of the Rising Sun

There is glory in fighting, but one must both live and fight with honor for that glory to matter. Every Warrior of the Rising Sun knows this truth, and they are all prepared to fight those who are dishonorable, whether in a duel or on the battlefield.
This character possesses unmatched honor, and is said to be both a skilled warrior and a gifted strategist.
Belongs to a Warror Bands bloodline §G$GAIN$§!
Can declare Wars of Honor against suitable targets.
Can spend Honor to call other Warriors of the Rising Sun into your wars.
Your liege can appoint you as a Commander regardless of your gender.
Can spend Honor to enlist a band of Ronin to assist you in your wars.
May spend Honor to become Japanese Feudal if eligible for the government.
Can prepare a Rising Sun Subjugation, calling in all possible society members in a war for the target kingdom.
May spend Honor to recruit skilled commanders.

By combining both common and uncommmon alchemical ingredients with their mystical knowledge, the members of the Renowned Apothecary Society can create miracle cures and perhaps even unlock the secrets of immortality. Of course, if the rumours are to be believed, some of the Society's members might instead be seeking to use their knowledge for more nefarious purposes...
A healer second to none, according to most, and possibly also a poisoner without equal if others are to be believed...
Can be appointed as the Court Alchemist of a liege with a Chinese government of Duke rank or above.
Can spend Alchemical Insights to acquire useful alchemical ingredients.
Can use a targeted decision to spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to test new alchemical potions on yourself, potentially gaining useful insights into how to heal or how to harm.
Can spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to sell potions to the common people for money.

Can use a targeted decision to spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to offer prisoners their freedom in exchange for partaking in a potion test, potentially gaining useful insights into how to heal or how to harm.
Can  spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to conduct a laboratory experiment, potentially gaining useful insights into how to heal or how to harm.
Can use a targeted decision on yourself or your courtiers to spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to brew a healing potion, potentially offsetting or even curing various ailments.
Can pick up one of three Lifestyles providing useful benefits to any alchemist.
Can use a targeted decision on yourself or your courtiers to spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to brew a clarity potion, potentially resulting in a clearer mind.
Can use a targeted decision on yourself or your courtiers to spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to brew a fertility potion, potentially resulting in increased fertility.

Can spend Alchemical Insights to use a targeted decision on non-Grand Apothecaries in the Renowned Apothecary Society to conduct an interview, potentially obtaining some useful knowledge from the target.
Can use a targeted decision on yourself or your courtiers to spend Alchemical Insights and ingredients to brew an aphrodisiac, potentially resulting in others being more attracted to the target.
Can spend Alchemical Insights to increase the disease resistance of a province by right-clicking on the target county's coat of arms.

column3: Can spend Alchemical Insights to attempt to brew an immortality potion. The odds of success are always very low.
